name: Intake Approval
description: Validates that intake/scope approval exists and has not been rejected before research can begin

validations.description: At least one intake approval artifact must exist
Intake must not have FAIL status in frontmatter

notes: G1 passes if EITHER G1-INTAKE.md OR research/INTAKE.md exists in the essay directory AND does not contain rejection markers. Standard convention: artifact_path = src/app/essays/{slug}/.
